data.title: Queen Margrethe
data.text:
Royals

Denmark’s King Frederik X Will Reign in a Different World From His Mother’s—Can He Hold On to the Throne?

The departing queen, Margrethe II, helped to catapult the Danish royal family to stratospheric heights of popularity. Amid some controversy, King Frederik and Queen Mary are starting off on the right foot.

Royals

Prince Joachim Will Return to Denmark to Watch Crown Prince Frederik Become King

According to a palace spokesperson, the younger son of Queen Margrethe II, who currently lives in Washington DC, will be traveling without his wife and younger two children.

Royals

Crown Princess Mary and Crown Prince Frederik Join Queen Margrethe for the Final Public Appearances of Her Reign

The future king and queen have spent the day following Margrethe’s abdication announcement enjoying the annual series of New Year’s celebrations, where the royals greet government ministers, the nation’s diplomatic corp, and members of the armed services.

Royals

Queen Margrethe’s Abdication Announcement Featured a Special Tribute to Her Late Mother and Husband

The queen surprised her nation during her annual New Year’s address by announcing that she would step down on January 14, after 52 years on the throne.

Royals

Denmark’s Royals Find Their Palace Cinderella: “It Would Be Nice If Prince Christian Called”

The mysterious stiletto was a fairy-tale ending to a series of events that saw the heir to the throne celebrate his 18th birthday—and the importance of his royal role.

Royals

The Danish Royals Come Together to Celebrate Queen Margrethe’s 83rd Birthday

Denmark’s monarch was joined by her sons and all eight of her grandchildren in her first public appearance since undergoing back surgery in February.

Royals

The Danish Royal Family Starts the New Year With Fewer Princes

Last year, Queen Margrethe announced her decision to strip four of her grandchildren of their titles, and the family spent Christmas on three different continents.

Royals

The Ashtray Queen: Denmark’s Queen Margrethe II Does It Her Way

After adjusting her grandchildren’s royal titles, the 82-year-old monarch’s reputation for putting the crown before her family comes into focus.
